description: Try our easy to follow Moroccan Rice Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Moroccan Rice Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the rice, sugar, cinnamon sticks, vanilla bean paste and measurement water in a saucepan and bring to the boil.
Reduce the heat and simmer the rice, uncovered, for 20 minutes. Stir in the evaporated milk and rosewater and simmer for a further 10 minutes until the rice is tender. Remove the cinnamon sticks.
Pour the rice pudding into warmed serving dishes and sprinkle with the pistachios and rose petals, if liked. Serve immediately.
